<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Hunter's Arrowhead](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2343)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 153 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #145: Hellknight Hill](/Sources.aspx?ID=4) pg. 77

**Price** 80 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

A _hunter's arrowhead_ is meant to be worn as a charm, such as a pendant, or carried in a pocket or quiver. The arrowhead is etched with images sacred to the elven god [Ketephys](/Deities.aspx?ID=110). While you wear or carry the arrowhead, it infuses you with great skill at hunting, and you gain a +1 item bonus to [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) checks and attack rolls against any creature you've currently designated as your prey with [Hunt Prey](/Actions.aspx?ID=10). A _hunter's arrowhead_ is also a [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of Ketephys.

**Activate** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day; **Trigger** You would miss with an attack made with a [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3);  **Effect** You gain a +2 circumstance bonus to your attack roll, possibly turning a miss into a hit.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
